S

sellItem(int) - Method in class main.player.Player
Removes the item at a given index from this player's list of items.
sellItem(int) - Method in class main.shop.Shop
Facilitates the selling of items back to the shop.
sellMonster(int) - Method in class main.shop.Shop
Facilitates the selling of monsters back to the shop.
sellShop() - Method in class main.ui.CommandLineUI
Displays a list of the user player's items and monsters and lets them pick one to sell.
SellShopPanelControl - Class in main.ui.gui
This class implements a controller for a JPanel that shows the sell shop screen for the game GUI.
SellShopPanelControl(GraphicalUI) - Constructor for class main.ui.gui.SellShopPanelControl
The constructor that takes in the GraphicalUI class and sets up a new JPanel for viewing the sell shop.
setBattle(ArrayList<Enemy>, int) - Method in class main.arena.Battle
Sets up both player and enemy monsters to battle, then calls fight method, and returns a string of the outcome.
setDay(int) - Method in class main.environment.GameEnvironment
Sets the current day.
setDifficulty(int) - Method in class main.environment.GameEnvironment
Sets the difficulty of this game.
setGold() - Method in class main.arena.Enemy
Generates and then assigns an appropriate amount of gold based on game difficulty and current day.
setMaxDays(int) - Method in class main.environment.GameEnvironment
Sets the maximum amount of days this game can run for.
setName() - Method in class main.arena.Enemy
Generates and then assigns a random name for the enemy from a list of potential names.
setName(String) - Method in class main.monster.Monster
Sets the name of this Monster.
setName(String) - Method in class main.player.Player
Sets the name of this player.
setPlayer(String, Monster) - Method in class main.environment.GameEnvironment
Sets the player associated with this game environment.
setPoints() - Method in class main.arena.Enemy
Generates and then assigns an appropriate amount of points based on game difficulty and current day.
setSquad() - Method in class main.arena.Enemy
Generates and then assigns an appropriate squad of monsters for the enemy based on game difficulty and current day.
setup() - Method in class main.ui.CommandLineUI
One by one calls the methods associated with setting up the game and stores their outputs to set the starting game environment.
setupGame() - Method in class main.ui.gui.GraphicalUI
setup all of the panels that hold the GUI for different aspects of the game.
SetupPanelControl - Class in main.ui.gui
This class implements a controller for a JPanel that shows the setup screen for the game GUI.
SetupPanelControl(GraphicalUI) - Constructor for class main.ui.gui.SetupPanelControl
The constructor that takes in the GraphicalUI class and sets up a new JPanel for setting up a game.
Shop - Class in main.shop
This class implements a Shop which provides the functionality for the user to buy and sell purchasable items and monsters for gold.
Shop(GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class main.shop.Shop
Creates a Shop instance and calls current GameEnvironment being used.
ShopPanelControl - Class in main.ui.gui
This class implements a controller for a JPanel that shows the shop screen for the game GUI.
ShopPanelControl(GraphicalUI) - Constructor for class main.ui.gui.ShopPanelControl
The constructor that takes in the GraphicalUI class and sets up a new JPanel for visiting the shop.
sleep() - Method in class main.environment.GameEnvironment
Increases the day by one, refreshes the shop and arena, heals the player's monsters and implements random night events.
sleep() - Method in class main.ui.CommandLineUI
Calls the sleep method from the game environment and prints out the night events.
Squad - Class in main.monster
This class implements a Squad of Monsters that is owned by an instance of the player class.
Squad() - Constructor for class main.monster.Squad
Instantiates the variables for this Squad.
SquadPanelControl - Class in main.ui.gui
This class implements a controller for a JPanel that shows the view squad screen for the game GUI.
SquadPanelControl(GraphicalUI) - Constructor for class main.ui.gui.SquadPanelControl
